data.text: @Bronson00471184 You need help, Bronson. Blocking people who call out your blatant lies is what cowards do. You act like such a tough guy on the internet but when you're confronted with your own deceit you run away like a baby. I'm so disappointed in you!

@Bronson00471184 Bronson, there was a great segment on CBC radio this morning about people like you who have been radicalized by internet algorithms pushing false information. It starts at about 31:45 https://t.co/AX5YnV45NK
